title: The Oregon Trail (Classic Edition) (1990) (PC Game) (HereticXS)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Oregon Trail: Classic Edition (1990) (PC Game)
Released by HereticXS - specializing in authentic releases of old-school games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This release was ripped from an authentic physical CD of the original MS-DOS
media. It includes bin/cue CD image files of the original installation CD.

This release includes LaunchBox (and DOSBox) which will allow you to easily play
the game on modern Windows PCs. No configuration or installation is necessary.
Simply run LaunchBox.exe and then double-click on the game to play.

As a covered wagon party of pioneers, you head out west from Independence,
Missouri to the Willamette River and valley in Oregon. You first must stock up
on provisions, and then, while traveling, make decisions such as when to rest,
how much food to eat, etc. The Oregon Trail incorporates simulation elements and
planning ahead, along with discovery and adventure, as well as mini-game-like
activities (hunting and floating down the Dalles River).
